column3: str

Uin Nee eagerly awaits a delivery of flowers, and slightly less eagerly awaits the return of a friend who may have met a terrible fate.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the flower-picking pixie in the east of Phisor Lran and throw porxies to scare off any threats.
Speak with Uin Nee.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, I need your help! My friend went to pick flowers a while ago, but no one has seen hide nor hair of them since!
I suspect it was the work of─ No, it's too soon to say for certain.
The best thing to do is send out a search party, consisting of...well, you of course!

You should probably start looking where all the prettiest flowers grow, which would be east of Phisor Lran. And if it's what I think it is, be prepared for an epic encounter that will shake the heavens! Or at least cause them to wobble a bit...
Sorry, but as you can see, I'm rather busy. Or perhaps you're here to help?
Uin Nee was worried about me? I'm quite safe, I assure you! And if anything were to disturb me, these porxies will send them on their merry way!
But since you've come all the way here, perhaps you could watch my back while I carry on picking flowers? On the off chance that any beasties show, throw one of my adorable companions at them!

If any enemies appear, throw a porxie at them. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target the enemy and throw a porxie with <If(Equal(PlayerParameter(80),0))><UIForeground>F20222</UIForeground><UIForeground>01</UIForeground><Else/><CommandIcon(15)/> / <CommandIcon(8)/></If>.
Aaaaaaiiieee!
(-Another Flower-picking Pixie-)That's odd... Did you see another pixie picking flowers here? No? Oh, well. I'll just have to finish the job by myself! Tra-la-la!♪
Phew! That should be enough for the time being. So, was there any trouble? No? Jolly good. Thanks for keeping an eye out for me. Ta-ta for now!
So, you made it back, at least.
Though to be honest, I don't have much hope of ever seeing my friend again. Do you know what happened to them?
What will you say?
You'd better ask the beavers.
Some things are best left a mystery.
Even when I close my eyes, I can still see the...the beavers.
No, not the beavers! Don't let their appearance fool you; there is no greater evil in all of Il Mheg than those long-toothed horrors.
That's fine. I'd already jumped to my own conclusions anyway!
Oooh! It sounds like you'll be having some fantastic nightmares! If you ever manage to sleep again, that is.

In any case, it sounds like the flower collection is proceeding apace, and we'll soon be able to decorate Lyhe Mheg with beautiful flowers. And if we have to lose a pixie or three in the process, so be it!
